wikipedia_page.main: Prof Alexander Mair OBE FRSE DPH (1912–1995) was a Scottish public health expert.

response: *Prof Alexander Mair FRSE (1912-1995) was born and raised in the village and is buried there with his parents.
*Professor Alexander Mair. For services to Occupational Health.
Alexander Mair (1889-1969) was an Australian politician.
*Alexander Mair (minister) (1834-1911), leader of the United Presbyterian Church of Scotland
